__e: Oh, my wife really needs something and to get it I may have to forego my settlement.
But you're asking me to give up something I've wanted all my life, ever since I was a child, and I can't do it!
May I not become a mistress, may I not become a saint
That it is their very use in life, even if by it they must lay down their own?
Maybe one day I'll be lucky enough to find a man to live with, without either of us having to sacrifice each other.
Now, that brings me pleasure the thought of you pining away for me... forsaking family and love, for the promise of a deeper ecstasy.
There is nothing worse for a man than to give up their lives.
But there's something to be said for first, or finally, or sometime knowing what your grasp is without giving up courage,
Get somebody. Get someone over here. Oh, no, no.
